description: Rules for systematic debugging and problem resolution
content:
# Debugging Rules

## Problem Identification
- Reproduce issue
- Document symptoms
- Check security impact
- Review logs
- Update status

## Analysis
- Gather information
- Check security
- Review code
- Test hypotheses
- Document findings

## Solution
- Implement fix
- Verify security
- Test thoroughly
- Document changes
- Update status

## Verification
- Test solution
- Check security
- Verify fixes
- Document results
- Update progress
